action.action-desc: Ms. Lee of Pennsylvania (for herself, Mr. McGovern, Mrs. McIver, Ms. Ocasio-Cortez, Mr. Thanedar, Ms. Tlaib, and Ms. Wilson of Florida) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce

form.official-title: To repeal section 504 of the Labor-Management Reporting and Disclosure Act of 1959 in order to permit certain persons to hold offices in labor organizations.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Union Participation for All Act.

section.header: Repeal of prohibition against certain persons holding offices in labor organizations

subsection.text: Section 504 of the Labor-Management Reporting and Disclosure Act of 1959 (29 U.S.C. 504) is repealed.
Section 401(e) of the Labor-Management Reporting and Disclosure Act of 1959 (29 U.S.C. 481(e)) is amended by striking to section 504 and.
